title: Why do we study about Mughal? - Quora

response.answer_text: Simply because we can't skip 331 years history of our country. They have given us lots of memorable heritage which are still present and are pride of our country. Their ruling technique was outstanding as they ruled on a very very large area with full efficiency. Their war techniques were also marvellous as they had won many battles. So there are lots of interesting things to know about them. Study hard kill the Boredom!!!
